response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth and significance to you. We propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,500,000. We are confident this price will not only ensure a mutually beneficial transaction but also allow us to maximize the value of our product for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
